page.title: 19KINNERTON & EVANCOYD W.I.s
page.content: BOTH OF THE WOMEN'S INSTITUTES ARE VERY POPULAR.THEY HOLD MEETINGS MONTHLY AT KINNERTON JUBILEE HALL & EVENJOBB VILLAGE HALL.THE PROGRAMMES ARE VARIED,WITH SPEAKERS FROM ALL OVER THE COUNTY CATERING FOR MOST INTERESTS BOTH INSTITUTES ENTER COMPETITIVE EVENTS INCLUDING LOCAL AGRICULTURAL SHOWS & THE OPEN DAY AT LLANDRINDOD WELLS.MEMBERS ORGANISE FUND RAISING EVENTS & GIVE HELP TO LOCAL CHARITIES. THEY ALSO HOLD ANNUAL OUTINGS & DINNERS.BOTH W.I.s SEND REPRESENT- ATIVES TO THE A.G.M.IN LONDON & DELEGATES ATTEND MEETINGS ORGANISED AT COUNTY LEVEL.EVANCOYD W.I. WAS FOUNDED IN 1919 & KINNERTON IN 194O.BEFORE THESE DATES THERE WAS A COMBINED RADNOR VALLEY W.I. HELD IN NEW RADNOR.
